author: Jonathan Thomas
description: “The inspiration for this cocktail is the plum cake I used to eat as a child. I wanted to capture the rich flavours I associate with these memories, but refine them into a drink to be enjoyed by adults.”
name: Plum Cake

recipeInstructions.text: MUDDLE peach in base of shaker
Add next rum, plum jam and spice syrup, SHAKE with ice and fine strain into ice-filled glass
TOP with ginger beer and a float of BACARDÍ Oak Heart
